Topic.Title: Lost 5k today, one saving grace. I have 3 Good calls on GOOG for next week.

Message.Msg: mdiadamo-You're on the beam,scalping is the most lucrative way to play options.I like buying the current weekly's puts or calls in or near the money.Buy calls when the 15 minute chart bottoms and buy puts when it tops. Share volume is key. Tops or short term bottoms are not trade able if the volume isn't there.Do not keep the contracts past Wednesday if you're down at all. The chart not hope,is the key to proofits.

Message.Msg: Thanks pdpp59. I started using this system as I didn't want to watch the market full time,wrapping my life around setting up straddles,etc.The one thing I have a problem with is letting my ego get involved ("I know this stock is in an uptrend/downtrend and I'm down on my calls/puts, but it will head my way soon") A good trader knows early if the trade if they got the right entry point and if not takes a small loss instead of a big one,and then looks for a better setup.Good luck to you!

Message.Title: read about theory of reflexivity
Message.Msg: In Economics reflexivity refers to the self-reinforcing effect of market sentiment, whereby rising prices attract buyers whose actions drive prices higher still until the process becomes unsustainable and the same process operates in reverse leading to a catastrophic collapse in prices. companies that will be victims of this theory are starbucks, google,linkedin netflix, chipotle, tesla.(you will make money via shorting them. companies that are already victims are Apple, blackberry, sola companies, gold companies,(you will make money going long until the prices become unsustainable once again)

Even if you are conservative GOOG can trade more than $600 based on the current news and trend. You will see more and more articles that pump GOOG, otherwise how can MMs dump their inventory to the retail.
